summary: The Limiting ICE’s Nationwide Encroachment Act (LINE Act) aims to restrict the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS) and the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) from disclosing Medicaid patient health information to U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) for immigration enforcement purposes. The bill explicitly prohibits the sharing of individually identifiable health information obtained during Medicaid enrollment under Title XIX of the Social Security Act, protecting patient privacy within the healthcare system.
